description: The AWS::Amplify::Domain resource allows you to connect a custom domain to your app.

AppId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: d[a-z0-9]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: (?s).+  
Update requires: No interruption

AutoSubDomainCreationPatterns.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AutoSubDomainIAMRole.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: ^$|^arn:.+:iam::\d{12}:role.+  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateRecord.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

DomainName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^(((?!-)[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,62}[A-Za-z0-9])\.)+((?!-)[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,62}[A-Za-z0-9])(\.)?$  
Update requires: Replacement

DomainStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

UpdateStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

EnableAutoSubDomain.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

StatusReason.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

SubDomainSettings.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AMPLIFY_MANAGED | CUSTOM  
Update requires: No interruption

CustomCertificateArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:acm:[a-z0-9-]+:\d{12}:certificate\/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateSettings.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AMPLIFY_MANAGED | CUSTOM  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: "^arn:aws:acm:[a-z0-9-]+:\d{12}:certificate\/.+$"  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateVerificationDNSRecord.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Update requires: No interruption

Certificate.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Prefix.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption

BranchName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: (?s).+  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

---
